Package com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget.toolbar

ToolBar and related classes.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
FillToolItem Fills the toolbar width, pushing any newly added items to the right.
LabelToolItem A label tool item.
LiveToolItem A specialized tool item for >LiveGridView that shows the current location and total records.
PagingToolBar A specialized toolbar that is bound to a ListLoader and provides automatic paging controls.
PagingToolBar.PagingToolBarImages PagingToolBar images.
PagingToolBar.PagingToolBarMessages PagingToolBar messages.
SeparatorToolItem A tool bar separator.
ToolBar A standard tool bar.
